#PrimaryVote!

Visit polling locations. Create voter education videos. Post daily. Earn points. Help Arkansas voters get informed.

Join the Game Read the Rules

1. Visit Polling Locations

Teams travel across AR-02 to document polling places, explain early voting, and show voters exactly where to go.

2. Post Daily Videos

Share short explainer videos on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, X, or Bluesky. Cross-post for bonus points.

3. Earn Points

Points are awarded only for listed submissions. Official scores include approved videos only.
